content.rendered: Awareness sessions and promoting the use of vaccination against diseases was conducted on the eve of World Immunization Week in Karnataka. The population of the locality is majorly daily wage earners who seldom seek healthcare for the fear of losing a day’s wage. The awareness session was a success because of the major turn out of the people and the queries that were raised by them.
